languages.text: {n}Рухнув на палубу и захлебываясь кровью, Иеронимус широко открывает глаза и неожиданно мощным голосом провозглашает:{/n} "Горе, горе идет... Скорбное зарево, что застилает небо... Враги, что столпились у порога жадной толпой... Предатели, поразившие переборки дома сего, словно ржа... Измена и грех повсюду... Даже стражи чистоты запятнаны... Все... грешны..." {n}Кровь наполняет глотку проповедника, и тот умолкает.{/n}

{n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, his eyes wide open. Suddenly he cries out in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Рухнув на палубу и захлебываясь кровью, Иеронимус широко открывает глаза и неожиданно мощным голосом провозглашает:{/n} "Горе, горе идет... Скорбное зарево, что застилает небо... Враги, что столпились у порога жадной толпой... Предатели, поразившие переборки дома сего, словно ржа... Измена и грех повсюду... Даже стражи чистоты запятнаны... Все... грешны..." {n}Кровь наполняет глотку проповедника, и тот умолкает.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his own blood. His eyes are wide open. Suddenly he calls out, in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and sin everywhere... Even the guards of purity are themselves tainted... Everyone... is a sinner..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and sin everywhere... Even the guards of purity are themselves tainted... Everyone... is a sinner..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, with the eyes widely open. Suddenly he calls out, in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and transgression are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... Everyone... is a transgressor..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}希罗尼穆斯倒在地上，被鲜血呛得说不出话来，双眼大睁。突然之间，他以洪亮的声音高喊起来。{/n}“灾祸啊！灾祸降临了……凄厉的光芒遮天蔽日……贪婪的敌人已经来到了门口……腐化就像锈蚀一样，侵蚀着房间的墙壁……背信弃义，违法乱纪无处不在……就连纯洁的守护者本人也遭到了玷污……每个人……都有罪……”{n}鲜血灌满了他的喉咙，他彻底安静了下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, his eyes wide open. Suddenly he cries out in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}希罗尼穆斯倒在地上，被鲜血呛得说不出话来，双眼大睁。突然之间，他以洪亮的声音高喊起来。{/n}“灾祸啊！灾祸降临了……凄厉的光芒遮天蔽日……贪婪的敌人已经来到了门口……那些叛徒像锈蚀一样，侵蚀着房间的墙壁……背信弃义，违法乱纪无处不在……就连纯洁的守护者自己的也遭到了玷污……每个人……都有罪……”{n}鲜血灌满了他的喉咙，他彻底安静了下来。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}ヒエロニムスは血を吐きながら、デッキの上で倒れた。目は大きく開いていた。突然、彼は大声で叫んだ。{/n}「災難だ！災難がやって来る…空を覆い尽くす悲痛な輝き…ドアの前に現る強欲な敵の群…この家の隔壁を蝕む錆のような裏切者…この世は裏切りや背信で溢れている…純潔を守る者でさえ汚されている…皆…罪人だ…」{n}プリーチャーの喉は血で溢れ、彼は静かになった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, his eyes wide open. Suddenly he cries out in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヒエロニムスは血を吐きながら、デッキの上で倒れた。目は大きく開いていた。突然、彼は大声で叫んだ。{/n}「災難だ！災難がやって来る…空を覆い尽くす悲痛な輝き…ドアの前に現る強欲な敵の群…この家の隔壁を蝕む錆のような裏切者…この世は裏切りや背信で溢れている…純潔を守る者でさえ汚されている…皆…背信者だ…」{n}プリーチャーの喉は血で溢れ、彼は静かになった。{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus se desploma, ahogándose en su propia sangre, con los ojos muy abiertos. De repente grita:{/n} «¡Ay de nosotros! Se acercan calamidades... Un lúgubre resplandor que oscurece el cielo... Un ejército rapaz de enemigos en la puerta... Traidores que son como el óxido que corroe los muros de esta casa... La traición y la corrupción están por todas partes... Incluso los guardianes de la pureza están contaminados... Nadie... puede ser... totalmente inocente...». {n}La sangre llena la garganta del predicador y se queda en silencio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, his eyes wide open. Suddenly he cries out in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus se desploma, ahogándose en su propia sangre, con los ojos muy abiertos. De repente grita:{/n} «¡Ay! Se acercan calamidades... Un lúgubre resplandor que oscurece el cielo... Una multitud rapaz de enemigos en la puerta... Traidores que son como el óxido que corroe los muros de esta casa... La traición y la transgresión están por todas partes... Incluso los guardianes de la pureza están contaminados... Todos... son transgresores...». {n}La sangre llena la garganta del predicador y se calla.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus bricht auf dem Deck zusammen, an seinem eigenen Blut erstickend, die Augen weit aufgerissen. Plötzlich ruft er mit dröhnender Stimme aus:{/n} "Wehe! Wehe uns ... Ein trauriger Schein verdunkelt den Himmel ... Eine raubgierige Masse von Feinden steht am Tor ... Verräter wie Rost zerfressen die Schotten dieses Hauses ... Verrat und Verderbnis sind überall ... Selbst die Wächter der Reinheit sind befleckt ... Niemand ... ist rein ..." {n}Blut füllt die Kehle des Predigers und er verstummt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, his eyes wide open. Suddenly he cries out in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus bricht auf dem Deck zusammen, an seinem eigenen Blut erstickend, die Augen weit aufgerissen. Plötzlich ruft er mit dröhnender Stimme aus:{/n} "Wehe! Wehe uns ... Ein trauriger Schein verdunkelt den Himmel ... Eine raubgierige Masse von Feinden steht am Tor ... Verräter wie Rost zerfressen die Schotten dieses Hauses ... Verrat und Sünde sind überall ... Selbst die Wächter der Reinheit sind befleckt ... Jeder ... ist ein Sünder ..." {n}Blut füllt die Kehle des Predigers und er verstummt.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hiéronymus s'effondre sur le pont en s'étouffant avec son propre sang, les yeux grand ouverts. Soudain, il s'exclame d'une voix tonitruante :{/n} « Le malheur ! Le malheur approche... Un éclat sinistre qui masque le ciel... Une foule d'ennemis voraces à nos portes... Des traîtres qui, telle la rouille, rongent les fondations de cette maison... La trahison et la corruption sont partout... Même les gardiens de la pureté sont souillés... Personne... n'est parfait. » {n}La gorge remplie de sang, le prêcheur se tait à jamais.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, his eyes wide open. Suddenly he cries out in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hiéronymus s'effondre en s'étouffant avec son propre sang, les yeux grand ouverts. Soudain, il s'exclame d'une voix tonitruante :{/n} « Le malheur ! Le malheur approche... Un éclat sinistre qui masque le ciel... Une foule d'ennemis voraces à nos portes... Des traîtres qui, telle la rouille, rongent les fondations de cette maison... La trahison et le crime sont partout... Même les gardiens de la pureté sont souillés... Nous sommes tous... des pécheurs... » {n}La gorge remplie de sang, le prêcheur se tait à jamais.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04

languages.text: {n}Hieronymus, güverteye yığılıyor ve gözleri ardına kadar açık şekilde, kendi kanında boğulmaya başlıyor. Aniden gür bir sesle haykırıyor.{/n} "Keder! Keder geliyor... Yaslı bir parıltı, gökyüzünü yok ediyor... Haris düşman yığınları kapıda... Hainler pas misali hanenin bölme panellerini tüketiyor... İhanet ve yozlaşma her yerde... Saflık dizdarlarının kendileri bile kirlenmiş... Kimse... Arı değil..." {n}Boğazı kanla dolan vaizin sesi kesiliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Hieronymus collapses on the deck, choking on his blood, his eyes wide open. Suddenly he cries out in a booming voice,{/n} "Woe! Woe is coming... A mournful glow that blots out the sky... A rapacious crowd of enemies at the door... Traitors who are like rust, eating away at this house's bulkheads... Treachery and corruption are everywhere... Even the wardens of purity are themselves tainted... None... are unsullied..." {n}Blood fills the preacher's throat, and he falls silent.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hieronymus güverteye yığılıyor ve gözleri ardına kadar açık şekilde, kendi kanında boğulmaya başlıyor. Aniden gür bir sesle haykırıyor:{/n} "Keder! Keder geliyor... Yaslı bir parıltı gökyüzünü yok ediyor... Haris düşman yığınları kapıda... Hainler pas gibi, hanenin bölme panellerini tüketiyor... İhanet ve yozlaşma her yerde... Saflık dizdarlarının kendileri bile kirlenmiş... Kimse... Arı değil..." {n}Boğazı kanla dolan vaiz, sessizleşiyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian_Hieronimus_Ch04
